A

AdaptiveCrawlDelayMechanism - Class in com.github.peterbencze.serritor.internal.crawldelaymechanism
A crawl delay mechanism, in which case the delay corresponds to the page loading time, if it is between the specified range, otherwise the minimum or maximum duration is used.
AdaptiveCrawlDelayMechanism(CrawlerConfiguration, JavascriptExecutor) - Constructor for class com.github.peterbencze.serritor.internal.crawldelaymechanism.AdaptiveCrawlDelayMechanism
Creates an AdaptiveCrawlDelayMechanism instance.

Appends an internet domain to the list of allowed crawl domains.
addAllowedCrawlDomains(List<String>) - Method in class com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api.CrawlerConfiguration.CrawlerConfigurationBuilder
Appends a list of internet domains to the list of allowed crawl domains.
addCrawlSeed(CrawlRequest) - Method in class com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api.CrawlerConfiguration.CrawlerConfigurationBuilder
Appends a crawl request to the set of crawl seeds.
addCrawlSeeds(List<CrawlRequest>) - Method in class com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api.CrawlerConfiguration.CrawlerConfigurationBuilder
Appends a list of crawl requests to the set of crawl seeds.
